CustomField.description: Must - We have agreed to commit resources to this initiative. It is important for overall success. Should - This initiative is a good idea, but we are not committing resources to it at this stage. We will undertake these Initiatives if there are sufficient resources. Could - This is the default status, used for logging ideas before they are reviewed and prioritised by the Partner Team. Wont - This has been considered, and the Partner Team has agreed it will not be actioned at this stage.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Must - Agreed to commit resource. Important for overall success. Should - If there are sufficient resources we will commit. Could - Idea logged before the review/prioritise process. Wont - Partner team has agreed it will not be actioned at this stage.
CustomField.label: Priority
